The '''Mithril Armoury''' was a website selling ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|Lord of the Rings]]'' film merchandise. In particular, they sold the [[Middle-earth Enterprises|officially licensed]] swords, helmets, staves and shields produced by [http://www.unitedcutlery.com United Cutlery], as well as some non-official [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired material.

The Mithril Armoury was well-known to collectors and has a solid reputation (albeit slightly mysterious) as a dealer of Tolkien-related products. It was a regular advertiser in [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bi-monthly bulletin, [[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]].

In January [[2004]], Mithril Armoury was "temporarily closed", and re-opening was planned on [[1 July|July 1]], 2004. It never re-opened, and a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chapter_7%2C_Title_11%2C_United_States_Code Chapter 7] bankruptcy was filed in October.
